sourcesContent: import React, {Component} from "react"; import "../containers/Home.css"; import { Button, Checkbox, FormLabel, FormHelperText, FormGroup, FormControlLabel, FormControl, Typography, Grid, Box, LinearProgress, makeStyles, Container, } from '@material-ui/core'; import { LinkContainer } from "react-router-bootstrap" import {MuiThemeProvider, createMuiTheme} from '@material-ui/core' import {red} from '@material-ui/core/colors' import RouterImage from '../img/router.jpg' const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ button: { bottom: 20, position: 'fixed', margin: 0, right: 0, } })) export default function Step3(){ const classes = useStyles() return( Progress Gateway Are the following items in the box? } label="Gateway" /> } label="Requirement 2" /> ); }
